etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish اچقدن اچغه (açıḳdan açığa), from اچق or آچیق (açıḳ), equivalent to açık (“open; overt”) + -tan (ablative suffix) + açık + -a (dative suffix), literally “from overt to overt”. Cognates with Azerbaijani açıqdan-açığa, açıq-açığına, Turkmen açykdan-açyk, Uyghur ئوچۇق-ئاشكارا (ochuq-'ashkara).
